taxonRemarks: Translation by Holger Braun from Zwick (1973) catalogue, p. 241. [entered by DeWalt 2009] "1952 Isoperla alpicola ILLIES, Beitr. Ent. 2:385. - Terra typica: not designated; ILLIES refers to DESPAX 1936, who described the species under the name strandi - nec strandi KEMPNY - and mentions [the mentioning refers to DESPAX] material in Klosters in Switzerland. The subsequent reference to KÜHTREIBER 1934 and the mention of one of his collection sites as "terra typica" by ILLIES 1966 is not acceptable/valid. ILLIES assigns the species to BRINCK, who, however, only published a nomen nudum, as CONSIGLIO 1967b:46 explicates correctly!
